::Battera::

She could take threats, she could take getting shot at. But this 
walking feather duster pushed all her buttons.  She spread out her 
wings to full span and looked at Lady Hawk. She  said in a an 
agrivated voice,"One: I have not been cursed by being royalty. Two, 
Your tone of voice is that of a low life protoform. Third, I am not a 
serving bot. I am a warrior in the Allience. And I don't give a piece 
of scrap whether our guns bother you or not. They will kill you. And 
that's all I care about."  She had her hands balled into fists and 
was about to throw a punch at this very annoying, arrogant, ignorant, 
femmebot.  She forced herself to calm down. She opened her link to 
Zardus. "I got this femmebot out here who said that she was sent by 
Devilduer to come here and join us. I have my opinions on the matter 
but that is your decision."  She looked at LadyHawk. "Wait here 
untill Zardus arrives for you."  SHe slammed the entrance door on 
LadyHawk and fumed .  She was totally and completely filled with rage 
and hatred for that walking pile of feathers and frill.  She leaned 
against the door and waited for Zardus.  She knew she would have to 
work with the feather brained thing ouside the door if Zardus 
commanded her to, but that didn't mean she would have to like it.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Deep down inside Lady Hawk felt almost insulted by the implication 
that she
> might be Maximal. "You will lower your tone in my presence!" she 
exclaimed,
> folding her wings at her side to look more appropriate as 
royalty. "The
> rules of courtesy state that we conduct exchanges of words based on
> civility." the female bot stated as suredly as it had been told to 
her a
> cycle ago. " Not according to the obvious difference in our social 
skills.
> The snide female looked down on Baterra without trying.
> 
> "To answer your first question I was sent here by DevilDuer to work 
for the
> alliance" she paused for a moment before breaking one of the rules 
of
> courtesy "your second question I am a scientist working with DNA 
ingrading."
> Her eyes met Battera with a holier than thou look that royalty so 
often has
> with a commoner. "And your third question should be obvious even to 
a
> serving bot that I am not a Maximal.":
> 
> her gaze turned cold with disbelief that a nobody would have an 
attitude
> toward a higher being such as herself. "And don't even consider your
> autoguns a threat, if I'd worried about them they wouldn't still 
exist."
> Lady Hawk turned her back to Baterra as if to brush her aside, "I 
eliminate
> anything that I find" She glanced back a moment to hint at her 
words. "A
> nuisance."
> 
>
